channel.title: Fix to a 562 problem
channel.description:
There is a common problem that most people wants to fix and don't know how. Here it is:
[code][2012/07/06 14:26:42] [alhassa-scape]: alhassa-scape framework [2012/07/06 14:26:42] [alhassa-scape]: Loaded 15558item prices. [2012/07/06 14:26:42] [alhassa-scape]: Loading Server GUI... [2012/07/06 14:26:44] [alhassa-scape]: Reading mapdata... [2012/07/06 14:26:44] [alhassa-scape]: Loaded mapdata. [2012/07/06 14:26:44] [alhassa-scape]: Loaded packet handlers. [2012/07/06 14:26:44] [alhassa-scape]: Loading item definitions... [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Loaded 12375 item definitions. [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Loading npc definitions... [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Loaded alhassa-scape 324 npc definitions.
[2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Loading world list data... [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Setting up alhassa-scape world... [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Loading clans.... [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Loaded 0 TkoScape clans. [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Conve rsionException: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-ar gs constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-a rgs constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 3 ------------------------------- [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as i t does not have a no-args constructor : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor ---- Debugging information ---- message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor cause-exception : com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.reflection.ObjectAcces sException cause-message : Cannot construct com.rs2hd.model.NPC as it does not have a no-args constructor class : java.util.ArrayList required-type : com.rs2hd.model.NPC path : /list/npc line number : 3 ------------------------------- [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.convert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:88) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractRef erenceUnmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.colle ctions.AbstractCollectionConverter.readItem(AbstractCollectionConverter.java:77)
[2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.colle ctions.CollectionConverter.populateCollection(CollectionConverter.java:68) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.colle ctions.CollectionConverter.unmarshal(CollectionConverter.java:61) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.convert(TreeUnmarshaller.java:81) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractRef erenceUnmarshaller.convert(AbstractReferenceUnmarshaller.java:55) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:75) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.convertAnother(TreeUnmarshaller.java:59) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.TreeUnmarsh aller.start(TreeUnmarshaller.java:142) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.core.AbstractTre eMarshallingStrategy.unmarshal(AbstractTreeMarshallingStrategy.java:33) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarsha l(XStream.java:907) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.unmarsha l(XStream.java:893) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.thoughtworks.xstream.XStream.fromXML( XStream.java:845) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.rs2hd.model.World.setEngine(World.jav a:415) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.rs2hd.Server.<init>(Server.java:73) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: com.rs2hd.Main$1.run(Main.java:36) [2012/07/06 14:26:48] [alhassa-scape]: java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown [/code]
Quick explanation: XStream, what is used to save and load players in rs2hd, uses reflection, and with Jre7, you need to add a no-args constructor to the class that is shown above in red in the above. So what you'll have to do to fix this problem is that everytime you get this error, check what is the class, which is NPC in this example, and add a no-args constructor.
Example: [code]public NPC() { }[/code]
That's all for that problem, if you don't want to use my fix, simply go down to Jre6. If you got any questions, feel free to post below!

item.dc:creator: @Hash1 Hash1

So what you’ll have to do to fix this problem is that everytime you get this error, check what is the class, which is NPC in this example, and add a no-args constructor.

That’s all for that problem, if you don’t want to use my fix, simply go down to Jre6. If you got any questions, feel free to post below!
